title: Empirical instability strip for classical Cepheids II. The Small Magellanic Cloud galaxy
summary: Aims. This study aims to determine empirical intrinsic edges of the classical Cepheids instability strip (IS) in the Small Magellanic Cloud (SMC) galaxy, considering various effects that alter its shape, and compare them with theoretical models and other galaxies.
